channel.title: Fightpits screwed up. paying rsgp if needed
channel.description:
theres a few things wrong with my fightpits, it used to work fine but now its kinda messed up. things that need fixing message board blinking every second not being able to attack players when you die you dont get teled to start when everyone else is dead your left in game doesnt give reward when you win
msn: elijahpastaway@hotmail.com
*if needed i can give 10m rsgp*
